title: "How to Convert a Materialistic Bride into a Tolerant Companion?"
first_phrase: This text describes the common type of a bride in ordinary society whose love for appearances is greater than anything else. She is prodigal in her pursuit of admiration and adulation from others, while being parsimonious and greedily yearning for money. She idolizes her children, but only when they are physically ill; their spiritual well-being matters little to her. Her husband is seen as someone to please, obey, or sometimes even adore, but never as an equal. This creates a dualistic tension between an intelligent, righteous, and faithful husband and a fearful and bigoted wife. The author offers a solution - to convert the wife to the good through love or force, and set an example of virtue and tolerance. In this context, the house should be a theocratic monarchy, headed by a small pontiff.
content: Questo e' il tipo comune della sposa nella società' ordinaria, e più' terribile diventa se si accentua feroce il dualismo tra lei e il marito intelligente, esuberante di rettitudine e di fede, innanzi alla quale ultima la donna non appare che il più' vigliacco bigottismo, per paura che i santi irati mandino la febbre tifoide ai bimbi o intercettino la provvidenza che piove dai cieli a tutti coloro che han famiglia da alimentare, e che di essa nella diretta via del bene prendono cura. Che fare? Come in uno stato di vita animale così' meramente incomposto far piovere i due forieri della virtù', la tolleranza e la pace? Semplicemente così': convertire la donna al bene per amore o per la forza, operando, e dando esemplo di virtù' e di tolleranza. La casa deve essere una monarchia teocratica il cui capo e' un piccolo pontefice.
last_phrase: In order to create a peaceful and tolerant household, it is important to convert the woman through love or force, setting an example of virtue and tolerance. By waiting for the right moment to discuss and not imposing a way of life after a heated discussion, the woman may be more willing to understand and follow the lead. Ultimately, it is important to communicate with love and understanding to create a happy and functional household.
